# UIWritingToolsCoordinator.ContextScope.visibleArea

**Case**

An option to provide only the text in the currently visible portion of your view.

## Declaration

```swift
case visibleArea
```

## Discussion

With this option, include only the currently visible text, along with some additional text before and after the visible text.

## Getting the scope

- **UIWritingToolsCoordinator.ContextScope.userSelection**: An option to provide only the view’s currently selected text.
- **UIWritingToolsCoordinator.ContextScope.fullDocument**: An option to provide all of your view’s text.
